lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions directed federal prison officials to keep using the private prisons, which the Obama administration had planned to phase out.
snippet: Attorney General Jeff Sessions directed federal prison officials to keep using the private prisons, which the Obama administration had planned to phase out....

headline.main: Justice Department Keeps For-Profit Prisons, Scrapping an Obama Plan
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Keep Private Prisons, Scrapping an Obama Plan
